characteristic.name: Five Zone Heart Rate Limits
characteristic.description:
The Five Zone Heart Rate Limits characteristic is used to represent the limits between the heart rate zones for the five-zone heart rate definition (Maximum, Hard, Moderate, Light, and Very Light) of a user.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

structure.field: Five Zone Heart Rate Limits - Very Light / Light Limit
Five Zone Heart Rate Limits - Light / Moderate Limit
Five Zone Heart Rate Limits - Moderate / Hard Limit
Five Zone Heart Rate Limits - Hard / Maximum Limit
